alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Emery County through 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Green River, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green River and Elgin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 142 and 163. US Route 6 between mile markers 286 and 300. Utah Route 24 near mile marker 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
